title: Gifted Xayah but didn't get an icon
body: Just as the title says. I gifted a friend Xayah but I didn't get the icon you're supposed to get when you do. Any ideas why?

replies.body: Those icons will all be given out up to two weeks after Apr 26th. Be sure to check out the [**event page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions) for all the details, and reach out to us at that point if you still haven't gotten it by May 10th.
I gifted my friend Xayah since the 24th april, still haven't got the icon...

If you look at the event page, it says that the icons can take up to TWO weeks after the final event date to be delivered to accounts, so if you don't receive it at that point, then I would recommend submitting a ticket about it. But until then it's a waiting game.

Check out the event page for more info.

I received it 48hours after the purchase.
short video where you find the "gifted icon"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JacCrLadKTI
